meanings.definition: Bugbanes: plants of the genus Cimicifuga, known for their insect-repelling properties.
meanings.sent1: The bugbanes in the garden kept the insects away.
meanings.sent2: Many people plant bugbanes to keep bugs out of their yards.
meanings.sent3: The bugs took one whiff of the bugbanes and decided to have a picnic elsewhere.
meanings.sent4: The bugbanes stood tall like guardians, protecting the garden from unwanted visitors.
meanings.sent5: The scent of bugbanes filled the air, creating a barrier against pesky pests.

meanings.definition: Bugbanes: a substance derived from bugbanes plants, used to repel insects.
meanings.sent1: She sprayed bugbanes around the house to keep bugs away.
meanings.sent2: The bugbanes extract is a natural way to deter insects.
meanings.sent3: The bugs seemed to do a dance when they encountered the bugbanes spray.
meanings.sent4: The bugbanes essence worked like magic, making insects vanish into thin air.
meanings.sent5: Bugbanes potion was the secret weapon against the insect invasion.
